Package edu.ucla.wise.commons

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    UserAnswers
    Interface to encapsulate UserAnswers required to render a survey page.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdminApplication
    This class represents the Admin information when running the Admin application.
    AdminDataBank
    This class is interface between admin and the database.
    CacheFilter
    This class adds cache control headers to all the http responses through filters.
    ClosedQuestion
    This class is a subclass of Question and represents a closed ended question on the page.
    CommonUtils
    This provides some common methods that are used across the application.
    Condition
    This class is a subclass of Page_Item and represents a Precondition object on the page.
    ConsentForm
    This class contains a consent form object set in the preface.
    DataBank
    This class encapsulates the database interface for a Study Space.
    Directive
    This class is a subclass of Page_Item and represents a directive object on the page.
    EmailScheduler
    This email thread will spawn action of sending reminders.
    Interviewer
    This class represents an interviewer object
    InviteeMetadata
    This class represents the current set of fields as driven by the survey file.
    IRBSet
    This class contains a IRB set object in the preface.
    Message
    This class represents our email prompts
    MessageSender
    This class encapsulates some specific methods to send messages from Message Sequences.
    MessageSenderTest
    This class is used to test email sending part.
    MessageSequence
    This class contains a message sequence and its properties.
    NumericOpenQuestion
    This class is a subclass of OpenQuestion and represents an numeric open ended question on the page
    OpenQuestion
    This class is a subclass of Question and represents an open ended question on the page
    Page
    Page class represents a page in the survey and its various attributes.
    PageItem
    This abstract class represents a single page item.
    Preface
    This class is a preface object and contains information about a specific welcome page and consent form.
    Question
    This class is a subclass of PageItem and represents a question on the page.
    QuestionBlock
    This class is a subclass of PageItem and represents a question block on the page.
    QuestionBlockforSubjectSet
    Represents a question block that evaluates a subject set
    Reminder
    This class contains a typical reminder message sequence and its properties
    RepeatingItemSet
    This class represents a set of questions that can repeat based on user input.
    ResponseSet
    This class contains an answer set called response set and all its possible answers The closed question & question block contain this response set.
    SanityCheck
    This class is used to check if the inputs that application get are valid and there are attacks using these inputs
    SkipList
    This class contains a skip list set and all its properties
    StudySpace
    Study space is the core of WISE system -- represents the core abstractions for individual survey projects.
    SubjectSet
    This class contains a subject set and all its possible answers
    Survey
    This class is a survey object and contains information about a specific survey.
    SurveyorApplication
    Class to represent common elements for *this* local installation of the wise surveyor java application NOT the possibly-remote surveyor information for a given StudySpace.
    SurveyorSpec  
    TextOpenQuestion
    This class is a subclass of Open_Question and represents an text open ended question on the page.
    ThankyouPage
    This class contains a thank you page object set in the preface.
    TranslationItem
    This class contains a translation item and all its possible properties.
    User
    The User object takes actions and retains data for a specific user session User_DB_Connection is User's interface to Data_Bank (encapsulates user-specific AND database-specific calls).
    UserDBConnection
    Class UserDBConnection -- a customized interface to encapsulate single-user interface to data storage.
    WelcomePage
    This class contains a welcome page object set in the preface.
    WISEApplication
    Class to represent common elements for a given installation of the wise surveyor or admin java application.
    WiseConstants
    This class contains the constants used in the application.
    WiseTestApp
    WiseTestApp class is used to test the creation of survey and user object along with some methods.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FileExtensions
    This enum defines the supported File Extension types used in the WISE application.
    User.INVITEE_FIELDS  
    WiseConstants.STATES  
    WiseConstants.SURVEY_STATUS
